resources.string: Wifi Hotspot
Turn hotspot on and off. Check if hotspot is enabled. \nThe hotspot must be preconfigured in the system settings.
Mobile Data
Manage mobile data (internet connection). Check if mobile data is enabled.
Battery
Get level of the devices battery and check if it is loading.
Location
Get location of this device.
Wifi
Turn wifi on and off. Check if wifi is enabled.
Bluetooth
Turn bluetooth on and off. Check if bluetooth is enabled.
Audio
Manage volume of ringtone, music and more.
audio types: ring, music, alarm, notification, system, phonecall, dtmf \nvolume: index (e.g. 6), percentage (e.g. 90%), vibrate or silent (only for audio type ring)
Display
Manage the display\'s brightness and state (on or off). Set time, after which the display is turned off when the user is not interacting with the phone.
brightness: percentage (e.g. 50%) or auto \ntimeout: time, after which the display is turned off (e.g. 30min, 10.5s, 500ms)
Camera
Take picture with predefined or individual settings.
settings: individual settings for this capture possible options: front cam, back cam, cam [index], flash on, flash off, flash auto
